aboutPage.title: About Us
aboutPage.lead1: Al Hassaniya Cooperative for traditional pottery and tiles is a leading craft institution in Safi, blending Moroccan authenticity with modern creativity. Thanks to our artisans' expertise and production quality, we have evolved beyond a traditional workshop into a fully-fledged factory capable of meeting both local and international demand.
aboutPage.lead2: We don't only offer artistic and decorative pieces; we also provide large-scale production of pottery and tiles in all forms, making us a trusted partner for major retailers and distributors who seek quality and continuity.

mission.desc: We believe every piece carries the spirit and heritage of Safi. We aspire to bridge Moroccan traditional craftsmanship with global markets while preserving identity and quality.
